divs: Sighting Detailsi was working exited the rear of the building lit my ciggerette when i noticed a plane flying over head then remarked to myself how clear a night it was yet lacking in stars due to the brightness of the moon so i looke over at the moon and i a verry large triangle shape 4-5 times larger than the moon where 3 motion less blue circles as i looked at them the faded from blue to red then i came back in to report it to a co worker who is a ufo buff and he sudjested i report it on this sight
Summary: 3 collered lights to the left of the moon in a verry large triangle
